alert.note: Alert for Benson; Eddy; Towner (North Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued March 17 at 11:57AM CDT until March 17 at 9:00PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM CDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Blowing and drifting snow. Winds gusting as high as 40 mph. * WHERE...Towner, Benson and Eddy Counties. * WHEN...Until 9 PM CDT this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery travel conditions. Widespread blowing snow will significantly reduce visibility. The hazardous conditions will impact the evening commute. The cold wind chills as low as 25 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 30 minutes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Out of town travel will be the area with the most difficult travel conditions with isolated whiteouts and blizzard conditions possible where light snow occurs.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for North Dakota can be found at travel.dot.nd.gov and for Minnesota at 511mn.org, or by calling 5 1 1 in either state.
